text:
Humbleness is a strength of a leader. When you get in a position of power, it reveals the real you.

Treat people nicely.

Everything is temporary but humility always leaves a legacy.

SEO champs, focus on Link Building:

- Get a blog
- Scale it up by adding value to the readers
- Sell affiliate products
- Sell links on existing/new blog posts

A ton of CASH is lying idle in the market for this niche.

A perspective: social pressures are undeniable.
 Let’s redefine what truly matters in marriage and stop glamorizing luxury as a necessity!

As a freelancer, if you want to ace marketplaces, factor in the following

- A good profile is always a winner.
- Learn communication skills
- Show multiple skills (master them first)
- Keep submitting bids/proposals
- Be first, early submission of proposals or responding quickly to messages helps

Self-care isn’t selfish, it’s essential.
Take a moment, recharge, and watch how it uplifts everything else.

The efforts and energy you spend seeking a new 9 to 5 job opportunity can be well-planned in advance if you equip yourself with tech skills and soft skills.

For tech skills, see what resonates well with your current job responsibility.

For soft skills, learn communication skills, 'verbal and written'. This will put you halfway up the track.

You never know, this combination of skill scould break you free from your current 9 to 5 job.

Think growth,
Think future,
Think self-empowerment.

Most importantly,

Think Freedom!

Dear entrepreneurs, and business owners.

As you expect to be paid on time by your clients, your employees expect the same from you.

Take care of your people. They will take care of you when you need them the most.
